title: Virat Kohli Puts His Surreal Success Down To His ‘Super Hero’ Father
text:
Indian captain Virat Kohli has been one of the greatest batsman of this era. He has accumulated tons of runs and shattered the records books.

BCCI

In a career that going from strength to strength, Kohli has said his path became simple due to the decisions taken by his father, who he termed as his "super hero" in real life. “My father till the time he was in this world he has been always been my superhero,” Kohli said here when asked who was his ‘super her’ in real life.

Kohli, who is currently the number one ODI Batsman, and also the number two ranked Test Batsman, has been in top form over the last god knows how many years, and has been scoring runs for free and also leading team India from the front.

AP

He has had insane success on the field, and Virat Kohli has thanked his father for all the glory on the pitch.

“Many people can inspire or motivate you, but when someone sets an example in front of you, the impact is different. The examples he (my father) set in front of me.. like when I was playing cricket when I was young...the decisions he took with regard to my career. He could have told me different dimension. Due to his personality and decisions, my focus always remained that I will go ahead on the basis of hard work and not by any other way,” he said.

AFP

He was speaking after launching an animated series based on Kohli himself, which will be aired on Star Sports Network, Star Plus and Disney from November 5.

Virat Kohli is on a break currently having opted out of the T20 series against Bangladesh, but will lead the side in the Test Series which will start on November 14.

(With Inputs From PTI)
